proposal.fictionalClientDescription: FreshFare Market is a fast-growing online grocery delivery service serving urban customers across Toronto, Vancouver, and Montreal. With a curated selection of local produce, specialty goods, and same-day delivery, FreshFare has built a loyal following among health-conscious shoppers who value convenience and quality.
proposal.coverHeadline: Transform Your Grocery Delivery Experience With a High-Performance Mobile App
proposal.coverSubheadline: Seamlessly bring FreshFare Market to your customers’ fingertips—fast, reliable, and fully branded.
proposal.clientOverview:
FreshFare Market has seen rapid growth over the past two years, capitalizing on the surging demand for premium online grocery delivery. Your robust Shopify store and localized marketing have helped you capture a dedicated customer base that values fresh, curated products and exceptional service. With ambitions to expand your market share in Canada’s top cities, you’re now focused on deepening customer loyalty and increasing order frequency. 

You have invested heavily in your web experience, but are now exploring how a native mobile app could further differentiate FreshFare, make ordering even easier, and drive more repeat purchases—especially among your most engaged users. Your team is looking for a partner who can deliver a branded, fully-featured app quickly, without the disruption and cost of a traditional custom build.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
Your current mobile web experience, while functional, doesn’t deliver the frictionless, always-on convenience that today’s shoppers expect. Customers have voiced a desire for faster reordering, personalized offers, and easier access to their favorite products—capabilities that are best delivered through a native mobile app. Additionally, without a direct channel like push notifications, it’s challenging to reactivate lapsed users or recover abandoned carts in real time. 

You are also facing increasing competition from nationwide grocery chains launching their own apps, putting pressure on FreshFare to match or exceed their digital experience. With your lean tech team focused on core operations, you need to avoid the delays, technical risk, and duplicated maintenance that come with building a separate app from scratch. You require a solution that works seamlessly with your Shopify store, preserves your existing workflows, and supports ongoing growth.
proposal.opportunitySection:
Launching a fully branded FreshFare Market mobile app is a powerful opportunity to deepen loyalty, boost order frequency, and stand out in a crowded market. By leveraging your existing Shopify infrastructure, we can deliver your app in as little as 30 days—ensuring all your products, features, and customizations remain perfectly in sync between site and app. 

With built-in push notifications, you’ll be able to alert customers to new arrivals, flash sales, and abandoned carts instantly—driving higher engagement and revenue at no extra cost. Our proven approach eliminates the complexity and overhead of maintaining separate platforms, freeing your team to focus on growth. 

Together, we’ll create a mobile app experience that’s fast, intuitive, and as fresh as your brand—empowering your customers to shop anytime, anywhere with just a tap.

recommendedServices.name: Shopify Mobile App Development
recommendedServices.description: We’ll transform your existing Shopify store into a high-performance native mobile app, fully branded for FreshFare Market. This ensures your customers enjoy a seamless, app-native shopping experience without sacrificing any site functionality.
deliverables: Full integration with existing Shopify store, products, and checkout
App Store and Google Play submission & approval

recommendedServices.name: UX Optimization & Custom App Design
recommendedServices.description: Our team will review your current web experience and optimize the app UI for mobile-first shopping, ensuring intuitive navigation and fast access to key features like search, reordering, and favorites.
deliverables: Enhanced product browsing and reordering flows

recommendedServices.name: Push Notification Strategy & Implementation
recommendedServices.description: We’ll develop a tailored push notification strategy to maximize engagement, including automated messages for abandoned carts, personalized offers, and order updates.
deliverables: Automated abandoned cart and promo notifications

recommendedServices.name: Ongoing Maintenance & Support
recommendedServices.description: We provide proactive monitoring, updates, and support to keep your app running smoothly and ensure it evolves with your business.

implementationPhases.description: We kick off with a detailed workshop to align on goals, review your Shopify setup, and map out app features and design priorities.
Our team creates custom app designs, optimizes the UX for mobile, and connects your Shopify store to the app platform for real-time sync.
We build and thoroughly test your branded app on both iOS and Android, ensuring seamless operation and a flawless user experience.
We submit your app to the App Store and Google Play, set up push notifications, and provide training for your team. Post-launch, we monitor performance and make data-driven optimizations.

pricingTiers.description: Everything you need to launch a branded FreshFare Market app, fully synced with your Shopify store.
Our most popular package includes advanced UX customization, a robust push notification strategy, and ongoing support.
For ambitious brands seeking maximum impact, this package includes API integrations, advanced analytics, and priority support.

caseExamples.title: Pharmazone: Rapid App Launch Drives Revenue
caseExamples.context: Pharmazone, a leading online pharmacy, needed a mobile app to boost engagement and streamline ordering.
caseExamples.result: Launched in 2 weeks, achieved 15x more revenue per user in-app, and converted 22% of abandoned carts via push notifications.

caseExamples.title: SLEEFS: Higher Order Value and Retention
caseExamples.context: SLEEFS, a sportswear e-commerce brand, wanted to increase repeat purchases and average order value.
caseExamples.result: Saw a 30% higher average order value and tripled revenue per user after launching their app with us.

proposal.ctaHeadline: Ready to Deliver a Best-in-Class Mobile Experience?
proposal.ctaBody: Let’s help FreshFare Market become your customers’ go-to grocery app. We’re ready to guide you from kickoff to launch and beyond—delivering measurable results every step of the way.

enriched.positioning: MobiLoud positions itself as the fastest, most reliable way for businesses to turn their existing websites into fully branded, high-performing native mobile apps without the cost, complexity, or duplication of traditional app development.
valuePropositions: Launch a fully branded mobile app in 30 days with no need to rebuild your website.
Keep all website features, design, and integrations perfectly in sync between site and app.
Push notifications drive higher retention, repeat purchases, and recover abandoned carts at no extra cost.
Full-service partnership from build to launch and ongoing optimization, including dedicated customer success management.
Significantly lower cost and complexity compared to traditional custom app development.
differentiators: No need to rebuild or maintain separate app and website—everything stays in sync automatically.
Full-service approach with hands-on support from setup to ongoing optimization, unlike DIY app builders.
Works with all existing website features, plugins, and integrations, with no API or tech stack limitations.
Fast time to market—apps can launch in as little as 30 days.
Push notification capabilities built-in to drive engagement and revenue at no extra cost.
